39290223.review: Ramte ikke balancen mellem udfordrende og afslappende. Gyselig grafik og tam historie.

39170765.review:
I wanted to like this game. I really did. I enjoy HO from time to time. The puzzles weren't too bad, albeit mostly on the easy side. I just couldn't get over the crappy story. The writing seemed like it was done by an 11-year-old girl, and the voice acting, well, it just made me laugh sometimes. Or cringe. I realize the story lines in HO games really aren't supposed the best to begin with. But this one... well, it made it difficult for me to even want to finish the game, it was getting unbearable. 
Oh, and the ending was terrible.

39130024.review: Klasik gizli obje oyunlarından. Genel olarak iyi. Ara sinematikler düşük çözünürlükte olmamalıydı. Neden böyle birşey yaptıklarını anlamak zor. Genel olarak tavsiye+

39100765.review: A cross between a point-and-click adventure and a hidden object puzzler, Darkarta provides an interesting story with an Indian background.

39040250.review:
This casual point-and-click adventure is rich and rewarding, but not without flaws.

First note that though it has hidden-object scenes, there aren't very many. Most of the distractions come from puzzle mini-games, which are all quite enjoyable, and the actual “adventuring” of using objects with each other, which here is relatively challenging as well as not always logically deducible. Still, there is enough diverse content to keep fans of the genre satisfied.

All that is fine. The game's core flaw is its storytelling. The story is an ambitious weaving of two narratives (one of which is steeped in South Asian lore) via reincarnation. That sounds like it [I]could[/I] be great, but unfortunately the dev team's skills are not up to the task. The end result is an emotionally confusing field of narrative debris. The many cut scenes are well produced, but in the end they fall flat because the context is weak. I almost never want to skip cutscenes, in any game, but Dakarta really tried my patience.

Another flaw is the game engine: annoyingly slow movement between scenes and general clunkiness.

So, thumbs up, I enjoyed this, but see lots of room for improvement.

39029656.review: I love this game!!! The story is moving unlike other hidden object games, this one has an objective you can really get into, before you know it you have spent hours playing, you almost forget it is a game. I can't wait for a sequal. I have already recommended to family and friends, this game ROCKS.

38956969.review:
Gorgeous artwork, and a variety of fun puzzles. Well worth playing.
I just wish that the morphing objects could be clicked on more often, and not just immediately after morphing, which can take a very long time.

38887999.review: This had a cool story and was very pretty to look at. I did have to skip two puzzels because of game issues. One of the puzzle the items was missing from the table and the other puzzle was the flowers didn't regoinze that I had each row adding up to 15 perfectly. But other then that totaly worth it.

38863714.review: 还可以，流程很长，难度略大

38806236.review: Do you want light puzzles, hidden objects, and some really earnest/cheesy art and writing?  Darkmartha has enough of all that to gag a horse.  It has a good hint system (which you likely won't need much - it's mostly straightforward), allows you to skip anything you don't want to do, runs smooth, looks nice, and generally ticks every box I can imagine in a game like this.

38601115.review:
Voici l’Édition Collector de ce jeu d’Objets Cachés. Contrairement à l'Édition Standard, il est possible d’avoir le chapitre bonus et les succès, mais les problèmes mentionnés dans mon évaluation de la Standard sont toujours présents, bien qu’ils arrivent moins souvent. Je ne peux donc pas le recommander. Il y existe des meilleurs jeux d’OC, sans bug divers.  Le seul truc que j’ai trouvé sympa, c’est que ma sauvegarde de l’Édition Standard est compatible avec la Collector. J’ai donc pu reprendre ma partie où je l’avais laissée. 

Mon évaluation de l’Édition Standard : http://store.steampowered.com/recommended/recommendgame/634180

38322825.review: First time review. This game was great! I have played a large number of games in this genre but this has been a real treat. There is plenty of content to enjoy, and the imagery, sound and storyline are just right. It is a wonderful game to relax with.

38319225.review:
I was so touched by the memories collections constructed around the mother and her child in this game, that all my natural snarkiness reserved for this genre was drained away. 

Without the memory collectibles, this game would already standout as a high quality title in the Casual / Hidden Object genre, but with them the developer has created something I found unique and moving. I highly recommend this game.

38264254.review: I like this game. The graphics are good, game play is smooth and the puzzles are fun. I would recommend.

38035898.review: Five full stars! A really beautiful game, amazing gfraphics, a great story, puzzles are intriguing, varied, and not too hard. I loved it!

38017681.review:
Nous incarnons Mary, une orpheline qui part en voyage avec son époux et leur fille unque, Sophia, après avoir reçu une étrange lettre. Celle-ci promettait à Mary des réponses quant à son passé. Mais alors que son aventure commançait à peine, le jeu prend une tournure fantastique avec l'apparition d'un nouveau personnage qui kidnappe Sophia et blesse son époux. Mary se retrouve donc seule à résoudre moults énigme pour sauver sa fille et rompre la malédiction qu'elle a créé dans sa vie antérieure.
De très beaux graphismes, une bonne musique et une super histoire. J'ai passé un excellent moment au près de Mary.

40931330.review: Very nice casual game with hidden object and puzzles with a nice story line also.

40775224.review: Often not clear as to what it is that you want to accomplish with the puzzles. VERY few HO minigames. Bad story. Too many symbols used in puzzles and minigames. The Guide book was a joke.

40692027.review:
Game Information

Darkarta: A Broken Heart's Quest CE, is a HOPA game, that is developed and published by Tuttifruit Interactive.

 CE - Collector's Edition. 
 HOPA - Hidden Object Puzzle Adventure.

Since this is a collector's edition game, it comes with extra features, that are not available in its' counterpart; the standard edition.

Game Visuals

I want to mentioned that the visuals for this game is nicely done. The visuals can be adjusted in the game's menu option.

Game Audio

I want to mentioned that the audio for this game is well done even if it is simplistic and somewhat repetitive. The audio can be adjusted in the game's menu option as well.

Gameplay

There are four different difficulty game modes to choose from: Casual; Advanced; Expert and Custom.

The notebook keep tracks of the progression in the game. Such as story events and clues.

There is an interactive map in the game. It allows the player to fast travel between each location quickly. It also indicates that there are certain tasks that needs to be completed at certain locations within the game. The interactive map is automatically given at the start of the game.

There is no padlock feature that is available to lock the inventory panel in place. The inventory panel is stationary.

There are some interactive items in the game. Some of the interactive items may require extra components before they can be interact with. All interactive items are marked with a symbol in one of the corners.

The hidden object scenes consists of the following: Shadow items; Find pair items; Traditional word lists. Most of these hidden object scenes may require little or no interaction. Some of the hidden object scenes can be replayed in the game's extra feature section.

There is an optional mini game: Match 3. It is only available during hidden object scenes.

The puzzles are fairly easy to solve without having the need to skip any of them. Most of the puzzles can be replayed in the game's extra feature section as well.

There is a collectible in the game: Memories. They are scattered throughout the game for the player to find.

There are morphing objects (beyond objects) in the game. They are scattered throughout the game for the player to find as well. 

There are forty different achievement that can be unlocked from playing the game. Each of these achievements does come with some requirements that needs to be completed before they can be unlocked.

Since this is a collector's edition game, there is a bonus chapter, but it can be access only after the main story is completed.

Miscellaneous

There are extra features in the game: Bonus Chapter;  Bonus Hidden Object Scenes; Bonus Puzzles; Wallpapers; Concept Art; Soundtrack; Prequel Comic Book; Game's Strategy Guide.  Most of these extra features can be access only after the entire game is completed. The game's strategy guide can be access anytime during gameplay.

There are ten different trading cards to collect. You only get five of those trading cards from the game. There are several ways to get the rest of the trading cards: Purchased from the Steam's Community Market; Trade with friends; Booster Packs and its' Booster Pack Creator.

Final thoughts: I have found the game enjoyable to certain extent. The replay value for this game is low. I would recommend this game but not at the game's full price value.

40583110.review: One of the better HO games I've played in awhile. It includes a bit of everything in the HO scenes: Search by description, search by outline, and search multiple objects of same type. At first, the story was a bit simple, but if you keep up with reading your journal, it gets fleshed out more. There were two types of searchable extras, and the game places icons on your map to make sure that you shouldn't miss any. The aftergame extras were packed with the usual (wallpaper, music, replay of games & HO scenes, etc), but also included a prequel/origin comic book of some of the characters.

40579893.review: Really love this game!  I love that you can sit back and relax and point and click whilst looking around for clues to the next move.  The storyline is not only great, but the graphics are fantastic for the type of game this is (ie. more of a puzzle game).  I would definitely recommend this game to anyone who likes a bit of mystery story and point and click (find the item) type of game as this is both excitement and relaxation all combined in the one package.

40533319.review:
I love this game a lot. Just wish you could play it through more than once at a time. Like if you didn't get all of the memories or morphing objects it would be helpful, if you could go back and replay it on the same profile.

Also the 'Guide'? wasn't very helpful. For one it jumped right over turning on the power for the Creek mansion in the correct place. Yes it had the information in it but, you can't get the banana for the baboon till you have the power and lights on. That had me a lot confused, so I stopped using it.

I loved the story and the color of the game and the play was great.

Thank you.

I'm new to this gaming lark - so here goes:

40364417.review: Buen juego, pero necesita idioma español :,c

40337503.review: Wow best game I have played in a long time!!  The graphics are amazing.  There are so many different types of puzzles you don't get tired of the same thing over and over.  After I finished the game I went straight to the TuttiFrutti Interactive website to see what other games they have but was so disappointed that this is their first.  Well done for your first game now we need more like this !!

40124312.review:
Данная игра — это безумно трогательный и один из интереснейших представителей жанра Hidden Objects!

[h1]Сюжет.[/h1]
Сюжет захватывает с первых секунд, заставляет волноваться и переживать за персонажей.
История визуализирована, как индийская, с красивыми и колоритными героями, устрашающими злодеями и милейшими мифическими крылатыми существами. Эта игра является некоторым рассказом, который показывает настоящую любовь, заботу и даже страшную ложь вкупе с предательством.
Ролики в игре смотрятся, как мини-фильмы, эдакое индийское упоротое кино с дикими поворотами событий. Здесь даже озвучены некоторые важные записки, которые помогут тебе полностью погрузиться в этот прекрасный мир!
[spoiler]Кстати, а чо с мужем-то? Шаман его вылечил ваще или чо? :D[/spoiler]

[h1]Головоломки.[/h1]
Это тот момент, когда тебе в загадку встраивают ещё несколько загадок, чтобы ты решал загадки, решая загадку. И это просто ВЕЛИКОЛЕПНО. Здесь очень много различных головоломок и квестов, даже если на примере пиксельхантинга, то есть сценки со стандартным поиском предметов, а есть сценки, где надо решать много головоломок, люблю такую насыщенность.
Есть загадки, для решеия которых придётся неплохо так пораскинуть мозгами, а есть и такие, которые возможно пройти секунд за 20-30, для снятия напряжения после тяжёлых решений.
Все предметы в игре находятся в логичных местах, если запутался, то можно взять в руки карту и пойти на точку с восклицательным знаком! Есть даже вещи, которые мы таскаем с собой несколько локаций, а то обычно всё одноразовое, что порой раздрадает.

[h1]Вывод.[/h1]
Для кого-то окажется проблемой, что нет русской локализации, но не для меня. Я люблю повышать навык изучения английского, а в этой игре он настолько примитивен, что даже смешно. В общем, с базовыми навыками языка ты точно в сюжете ничего не упустишь, да и к тому же выучишь несколько новых слов! Ролики сильно помогают визуально понять сюжет, если нить повествования была утеряна.
Очень довольна огромным количеством головоломок, довольна классным сюжетом. В бонусную главу я как-то особо не вникала, почему-то у меня в голове стоит некий барьер для восприятния дополнтельной сюжетной веточки, лол.
А ещё я рада тому, что даже в опасные и трогательные моменты я порой просто орала в голос, потому что такое махание руками, как у нашей героини, нужно видеть. :D

9,4 жутких девочек из 10.

40053600.review: This is a good HO game but could be made better by not locking access to earlier levels.

39924421.review:
This is a great game; rich story line, beautiful art and colours, and decent voice-overs. It plays smoothly; games are intelligent and logical (nothing worse than trying to figure out a game that makes no logical sense).
The only caveat is this is the Collector's Edition. DO NOT buy the regular game as it has so many frustrating bugs, I had to buy this one just to finish the game!  That said, this was a really enjoyable game that is worth the price of the Collector's Edition.

39845052.review: Вроде ничего, но затянуто слишком. История тоже немного подбешивает со всеми этими индусскими реинкарнациями и прочим. Но поиск скрытых предметов, как мне показалось, поинтереснее, чем во многих других играх.

39818586.review: This is a very lovely game. Pretty art style, with puzzles that are fun, but not annoyingly difficult. The achievements are easy to obtain. Interesting story which has kept me playing for over 10 hours and I still have more to go. I'd recommend this game!

39751029.review: Puzzles and HOGs are novel and pretty tough requiring two and three steps to complete.  Novel in that in that you haven't seen most of their likes before and require you to match two items/shapes to solve rather than just find the named item or shape.Graphics are excellent,  Store line good if not a bit confusing and hard to follow.  Hint:  write down character names as they come up so you know who the god guy and bad girls are.

39724657.review: Sagen wir es mal so: Ich war froh, als es vorbei war. Dazu kamen ständige graphische Fehler, die sich in nervigen Streifen über den ganzen Bildschirm zogen. Die Rätsel waren teilweise einfach nur hirnlos und sinnfrei. Ich habe schon 1000fach bessere Wimmelspiele gespielt. Ich rate daher vom Kauf ab.

39718982.review:
Aside from the ghastly kid I had to save, this was a pretty good game. The story was a bit grim, but then I'm not keen on happy love stories, so don't let me put you off,

I liked that the mom fell off about three cliffs and didn't die and never broke a nail, and I LOVED being able to play a Match 3 game instead of searching for objects in HOS. In fact, I am now addicted to Match 3, which kinda sucks. 

The HOS were interactive (well, the ones I did before becoming addicted to Match 3 were), so you're sometimes searching for objects to use with other objects. The puzzles were decent and not difficult. 

I had a heck of a time trying to find the morphing objects, and just gave up after awhile. 

The bonus chapter was very very short and wasn't up to the same quality of the game, and in it was a puzzle that involved using a sort of magnifying glass to search for tiny symbols that I cheated my way through. 

All in all I quite enjoyed this game.

39703956.review: For a hidden Object game its one of the better ones.  I like the story and the graphics are excellent.  Only complaint, I need to uninstall and reinstall to play the game over again.  Got it on sale.
39703956.developer_response:
Much happy to hear amber, that you loved it. 
To replay you just need to create a new user profile, no need to uninstall / reinstall.  
Cheers

39666734.review: Great game, amazing art style and great puzzles, great details,,, totally worth it!

39637779.review:
An overall good point and click adventure.

The animations for faces are awful and genuinely creepy tbh.

Aside from that, the rest of the art is lovely. The game play mechanics are interesting and varied.

The story drags a little bit, but is otherwise decent.

Definitely recommend if you can grab it in a sale.
